definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: blow, slaughter, plague, pestilence;—´[[מ]] abs. Nu 14:37 + 23 t.; cstr. [[מַגֵּפַת]] Zec 14:15; pl. sf. [[מַגֵּפׂתַי]] Ex 9:14; —
blow, = fatal stroke Ez Eze 24:16; in divine judgment (plague) Ex 9:14 (J).

plague, pestilence (divine judgment), of tumours on Philistines 1Sa 6:4; against Isr Nu 14:37, Nu 17:13, Nu 17:14, Nu 17:15, Nu 25:8, Nu 25:9, Nu 25:18, Nu 25:19, Nu 31:16, 2Sa 24:21, 2Sa 24:25 (ins. also v:2Sa 24:15 LXX Th We Klo Dr Kit Bu), 1Ch 21:22, Ps 106:29, Ps 106:30, specif. disease of bowels 2Ch 21:14; ´[[מ]] = infected people 1Ch 21:17; wasting of flesh, eyes and tongue, of hostile peoples Zec 14:12, Zec 14:18; attacking beasts v:Zec 14:15, v:Zec 14:15.
